answers.answer: How about starting self inducing methods like walking, bouncing on a birthing ball, sex, spicy food etc to get u going. She could still come on time

Im almost 39 weeks also have the same problem but I'm going to be induced this Wednesday because I'm at risk for preeclampsia. Im just worried that I'm gonna be in labor forever since I haven't dilated any and everyone's been telling me its gonna be long and painful lol

I didnt have ANY contractions with my first lol my cervix was closed and was not thinned out. Like seriously i had no signs of labor. Needless to say i was induced 10days after my due date lol and it took an entire day for the meds to make me go into labor :)
Oh and its not painful to be induced, like i said it did take a while but not painful:)
